Subtask 1/12.activity: Review tables, take orders, and set up for lunch service

Subtask 2/12.activity: Continue reviewing tables, taking orders, and setting up for lunch service

Subtask 3/12.activity: Take drink orders from customers and deliver them to the kitchen

Subtask 4/12.activity: Deliver food to customers, check on their satisfaction, and refill drinks as needed

Subtask 5/12.activity: Take additional orders from customers, including specials of the day

Subtask 6/12.activity: Deliver additional food and drinks to customers, ensuring prompt service

Subtask 7/12.activity: Check on tables regularly to ensure customer satisfaction and refill as needed

Subtask 8/12.activity: Manage table turns efficiently, balancing speed of service with quality of food and drink delivery

Subtask 9/12.activity: Handle customer requests for special requests or modifications to their orders

Subtask 10/12.activity: Maintain a clean and organized workspace, including the dining area and service stations

Subtask 11/12.activity: Finalize lunch service, ensuring all tables are cleared and cleaned, and customers are satisfied

Subtask 12/12.activity: Prepare for the afternoon rush by restocking supplies and taking a moment to review the day's tasks and specials
